subject: RE: [junit] Concurrent tests
msgSnippet: Not automatically, but you could divide the suite into n smaller suites and put them into an ActiveTestSuite. Kevin ... From: Mark Richards
messageBody:
Not automatically, but you could divide the suite into n smaller suites and put them into an ActiveTestSuite.
 
Kevin
 
-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Richards [mailto:mrichards@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2001 12:04 PM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: [junit] Concurrent tests

Is there any way to run multiple tests concurrently in one JUnit session?
We currently have >250 tests and it takes a long time to run them
sequentially, however some of the tests could be run concurrently without
impacting correctness or performance.  Does JUnit support this, and if not,
would it be hard to add?

Mark Richards
